Fantasy 











 





New king in town
 




Daniel Gibson deserves some love after his 31 points.  (Getty Images)



    

    

      The Cavaliers are in the Finals -- thanks to Daniel 
      'Boobie' Gibson. Gregg Doyel says that while the Cavs 
      are LeBron's team, that wasn't the case in the 98-82 
      Game 6 win. Tony Mejia says it's clear: Detroit's dynasty 
      is over.
    

  
 Related Links:• Clock troubles | 'Sheed tossed | Speak: CLE | DET |  Finals preview
 49; Series | LeBron No. 1 | Bracket | West: Spurs waiting |  Duncan


 


 

 





 Stanley Cup: Senators take it to Ducks in rough Game 3


    

      
      Home ice does make a difference for Ottawa. In a game that has 
      everything from three scrums at once to a Chris Pronger elbow, the Sens 
      make it a series with a 5-3 win.
    

  
• Ducks up 2-1 | Kunitz injured | Crosby wins Art Ross


 

 





 COT will only complicate matters at the Monster Mile


    

      
      Dover is tough enough under normal circumstances, but Pete Pistone 
      says Sunday's race 
      brings a new challenge: the Car of Tomorrow's first run at the 
      lightning-fast track.
    

  
• Newman on pole | Lineup | Busch: Edwards prevails
